To observe record antitumor activity . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study capecitabine . Patients receive oxaliplatin IV 2 hour , leucovorin calcium IV , fluorouracil IV day 1 15 . Patients also receive oral capecitabine every 8 hour day 1-2 15-16 . Leucovorin calcium fluorouracil administration hold dose level 4 . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
